text: The qualification for the 2013 Boys' Youth European Volleyball Championship was held from January 8–11, 2015. 31 teams are split into eight groups of 3 or 4 teams. The group winners and second placed teams were qualified for the 2015 Boys' Youth European Volleyball Championship in Bosnia and Herzegovina and Serbia. ==Competing nations== {| class="wikitable" width=100% !width=20%|Pool A !width=20%|Pool B !width=20%|Pool C !width=20%|Pool D !width=20%|Pool E |- | ' | ' | '''''' | '''''' | '''''' |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2013 Boys' Youth European Volleyball Championship |- |} ==Pool A== The mini-tournament was hosted in Brno, Czech Republic. |} |} ==Pool B== The mini-tournament was hosted in Jelgava, Latvia. |} |} ==Pool C== The mini-tournament was hosted in Nitra, Slovakia. |} |} ==Pool D== The mini-tournament was hosted in Ankara, Turkey. |} |} ==Pool E== The mini-tournament was hosted in Kecskemét, Hungary. |} |} ==External links== *Official site European Boys' Youth Championship Qualification Category:Boys' Youth European Volleyball Championship
title: 2013 Boys' Youth European Volleyball Championship Qualification
